long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Ad Blocker is a powerful and light-weight ads blocking extension for Chrome designed to remove all types of Advertisings from all websites. This AdBlocker creates and maintains a comfortable and safe Internet surfing by blocking annoying ads and malicious activities of all websites you visit. 

Youtube Ad Blocker is very simple to install and use. Add it to your Chrome and it will work automatically in background. Enjoy safe and smooth user experience.

Why do I need Youtube Ad Blocker?
Youtube Ad Blocker provides you advantages of ads-free Internet surfing, and makes user experience smooth and safe. For this the AdBlocker:
-	Blocks malicious redirects
-	Removes annoying ads like banners, pop-ups, chat windows, etc.
-	Blocks data mining while protecting your personal information
-	Removes unneeded advertising processes to speed up your Browser 

What does Youtube Ad Blocker blocks?
Youtube Ad Blocker blocks not only video advertisings on YouTube but also:
-	Banner ads
-	Chat windows
-	Pop-ups and pop-unders
-	Trackers
- 	Data miners and malicious redirects

Where Youtube Ad Blocker works?
This Youtube Ad Blocker works on most popular social networks, video and streaming platforms like:
-	YouTube
-	Twitch
-	Instagram
-	Twitter
- 	Facebook
and many more.
